basic_information.scholarship_name: The Dr. Mary Monfort Endowed Scholarship
basic_information.committee_name: CEPS - Dr. Mary Monfort Endowed Scholarship

description: Scholarship Mission: To provide scholarship assistance to students within the College of Education & Professional Studies who are a single parent. Eligibility Requirements Complete qualifying application Must be a single parent while obtaining their degree Must have a minimum GPA of 2.85 Preference given to student in a Reading program In a short essay, please demonstrate how this scholarship will impact your life Selection Process Recipients of the scholarship will be selected by a committee Award Requirements Must be enrolled in the upcoming fall and spring semester to receive award Attendance at an awards banquet is required for all recipients Recipients must write a thank you letter to the donors of the scholarship

qualifying_criteria.description: Hard requirements that must be met to qualify for the scholarship
